description: Relax and cool off at the Aasee beach area, where you can dip your feet in the water and enjoy the sunshine.

locationInfo.description: Aasee offers a popular beach area, ideal for sunbathing and dipping your feet in the water, especially on a hot day.
safetyTips: Keep an eye on personal belongings.

activity: Quick Ice Cream Break at Eissalon Venezia
description: Grab a quick and refreshing ice cream at Eissalon Venezia. Perfect for cooling off while enjoying a sweet treat with friends.

locationInfo.description: A popular ice cream parlor offering a variety of delicious flavors, perfect for a quick stop during a hot summer day.
safetyTips: Choose lighter flavors for a refreshing treat.
Watch out for melting ice cream!

description: Take a short break and enjoy the vibrant atmosphere at Prinzipalmarkt, Münster's historic city center with plenty of cafes and shops.

locationInfo.description: Prinzipalmarkt is a beautiful pedestrian square where you can take a quick break, enjoy the surroundings, and soak up the local culture.
safetyTips: Stay mindful of traffic in busy areas.
Protect your eyes from the sun with sunglasses.

description: Take a leisurely stroll through the lush greenery of Münster's Botanical Garden, a peaceful retreat perfect for a short visit.

locationInfo.description: Münster's Botanical Garden offers a cool, shady environment with a wide variety of plants, ideal for a brief and relaxing escape from the heat.
safetyTips: Bring a hat or sunshade to protect from the sun.
Take short breaks in the shaded areas.

description: Cool down by enjoying the refreshing fountains at Schlossplatz, where you can dip your feet in the water and relax in the shade.

locationInfo.description: Schlossplatz is a beautiful square near the castle with fountains, perfect for a cool and refreshing stop during a hot day.
safetyTips: Keep your belongings close while near fountains.
Wear waterproof shoes if planning to get your feet wet.
